title: Lock offensive items for people that are losing.
body: Can we get this please? i mean if your score is liek 0/5 in lane and you get told to build defense, maybe some people would get the message by having the offensive items locked out. sick of having people not itemize and just get one hit every fight because they can build a single defensive item.

replies.body:
It's something that defines the good from the bad players. 
Players have the right to itemise however they want (even if it seems stupid to outsiders).
